programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1761
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1025
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ai’s feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: In this prequel, young Mark heads to Saigon to find his cousin Mun and meets a female gang leader Kit, who teaches him gun skills. Kit falls for Mark but Mark knows Mun also loves her so he did not reciprocate her love. The return of Kit’s ex-boyfriend brings this love triangle to a head after he bombs Mun’s garage, forcing her to sort things out.

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China’s deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng (Wu Jing), returns into action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorizing innocent civilians.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: Zu:WarriorsFrom Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A classic fantasy action movie about the epic battles between celestial swordsmen and the Evil Force. Set on the mythical Zu mountain range, a mysterious land where ordinary men dare not venture, the legend has it that skilful swordsmen protect civilians by fending off evil. Featuring Sammo Hung, Yuen Biao and Adam Cheng and directed by Tsui Hark.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong’s caught in the Mong’s territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping’s limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen’s property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love…

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King’s sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Murderer Pursues
programme.desc: Wang Chung was a valued actor long before he became a director, but as a filmmaker, he helped create some of the most interesting thrillers Shaw Brothers ever released - including this fascinating crime saga of a Sino-Vietnamese crime gang. Danny Lee stars as a misunderstood refugee while Ray Lui plays a cop struggling against his own conscience to ensure that justice is upheld.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government’s secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor’s ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hung’s passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lu’s disciple.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas’ pursuit.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Sweet young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu's fiery attitude gets her locked away in a dungeon. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: Chou Lian Huan (Chen Kuan Tai) is good at fist fighting in Shanghai. In order to please a hostess named Chen Ju Fang (Ching Li), he is willing to sacrifice everything and fight against the son of the gang leader in Shanghai. However, is Chou’s action worth it?

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian’s rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian’s granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. When the two meet, they are entangled in the underworld of boxing gambling.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all the disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone in the temple except five Shaolin disciples. To take revenge on the Qing’s, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become “The Five Shaolin Masters”.

programme.title: Yaan
programme.desc: Chandru, a jobless man, vows to get a job after the father of his girlfriend opposes their relationship. His joy on getting a job in an Islamic nation ends when he is nabbed there for carrying drugs.

programme.title: Biscoth
programme.desc: After the death of his father, Raja begins to work in his father's company. He, however, finds his life changed when he befriends Janaki who narrates stories that come true for him.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Magalir Mattum
programme.desc: Prabhavati, an independent documentary filmmaker, with the help of her friends takes her mother-in-law, Gomatha, on a surprise trip to reunite her with her school friends.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: V
programme.desc: A mystery man named V sets out to exact revenge for his wife's brutal murder. However, he must evade a police officer, who is determined to catch him.

programme.title: Uppu Karuvadu
programme.desc: Chandran, a filmmaker, is forced to cast the producer's daughter, Mahalakshmi, as the heroine in his movie. But Mahalakshmi cannot act and Chandran struggles to teach her how to act.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Velan
programme.desc: A carefree Velan falls in love with his collegemate, Ananya, and plans to marry her. However, a mistake in the decision made by his father, an influential man, puts the couple's romance in jeopardy.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Following an accident, a young man gets a major surgery performed on his face. However, when he realises that a lot of people are after his life, he decides to find out why.

programme.title: Killadi Marumagan
programme.desc: The son of an egoistic businessman falls in love with an egoistic girl and has to convince her egoistic mother in order to marry her.

programme.title: Mirugaa
programme.desc: Forest officials in Kotagiri hunt a man-eating tiger that is attacking innocent people. At the same time, a serial killer is on the prowl for wealthy single women.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Wild Dog (Nagarjuna)
programme.desc: A brash but brilliant Indian intelligence agent leads a covert operation to nab the mastermind behind a series of attacks threatening national security.

programme.title: Pyaar Prema Kaadhal
programme.desc: Sree Kumar, a young man, falls in love with Sindhuja, a vivacious woman. However, complications soon arise and they part their separate ways only to reunite again.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: After CBI officer Bose recovers from a coma, people start to address him by a different name. However, he soon realises that this is a plot by the state CM to seek revenge for an old rivalry. How Bose rediscovers his past and identity forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Saaho
programme.desc: An undercover agent and his partner go after a thief who has stolen 2,000 crore rupees. Soon, they realise that the case is linked to the death of a crime lord and an emerging gang war.

programme.title: Jadaa
programme.desc: Jada, a rising football star, sets aside his ambitions to participate in a violent local tournament to avenge the death of his hero, Sethu.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Achanak
programme.desc: Arjun and his wife go on the run after she gets accused of murdering his brother. They must prove her innocence while trying to evade the police as well as the real criminals.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: David and Monty, estranged half-brothers, train in mixed martial arts to earn a livelihood. However, things change when the two are forced to compete against each other in the final tournament.

programme.title: Madholal Keep Walking
programme.desc: Madholal, a security guard, leads a content life amidst his loving family and daily-commute friends. However, his aspirations come to a grinding halt after a serious injury from an explosion.

programme.title: I Am 24
programme.desc: Hilarity ensues when a middle-aged man falls in love with a younger woman and tries to woo her by pretending to be a younger man.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Rangeela
programme.desc: Mili's ambition of becoming a famous actor is met with several hurdles when Raj Kamal, a noted actor, and Munna, her childhood friend, both fall in love with her.

programme.title: Zila Ghaziabad
programme.desc: A full-blown gang war comes to life in the district of Ghaziabad with the rise of the rivalry between gangsters Fauji and Satbir. A corrupt policeman, Pritam Singh, is sent down to set things right.

programme.title: Zila Ghaziabad
programme.desc: A full-blown gang war comes to life in the district of Ghaziabad with the rise of the rivalry between gangsters Fauji and Satbir. A corrupt policeman, Pritam Singh, is sent down to set things right.

programme.title: Siddhartha
programme.desc: Surya goes to Bangkok at his mother's request and changes his name to Siddhartha. He falls in love with Sahasra, but his mother asks him to marry the girl from his enemy's family.

programme.title: Baazaar
programme.desc: An amateur stock trader, Rizwan, goes to Mumbai and works for the successful Gujarati trader, Shakun Kothari. Everything seems to be going smooth until Rizwan faces betrayal from his idol.

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz
programme.desc: A young assistant director meets a woman working in his friend's office. He narrates his incomplete love story to her only to find out that she is his lover's cousin.

programme.title: Mere Baap Pehle Aap
programme.desc: Gaurav treats his widowed father, Janardhan, with love and care for raising him and his brother single-handedly. When he learns about Janardhan's childhood love, he decides to reunite them.

programme.title: Ekka Raja Rani
programme.desc: Vicky, a dreaded don, offers Barkha a job for saving his life and falls head over heels in love with her. When he finds that she is in love with Sagar, it does not go well with him.

programme.title: Ab Kya Hoga
programme.desc: After Ram's mother shares her desire of wanting a grandchild, he decides to get married. Later, Ram accuses his wife of being a ghost.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Trikon Ka Chauta Kon
programme.desc: Prakash, a married man, has an extramarital affair with Manisha and does not want the relationship to end while also hoping to stay married to his wife, Anuradha.

programme.title: Lailaa O Lailaa
programme.desc: Jai, special investigative agent, falls in love with Anjali and marries her. When he struggles to get hold of Victor Rana, a terrorist on the loose, he asks his wife for her help.

programme.title: Mr. Sukumar
programme.desc: Sukumar, a selfish wealthy man, returns to his village in order to ascertain his rights over the family property. However, he faces problems due to a few family members and ends up falling in love.

programme.title: Mr. Sukumar
programme.desc: Sukumar, a selfish wealthy man, returns to his village in order to ascertain his rights over the family property. However, he faces problems due to a few family members and ends up falling in love.

programme.title: Rafoo Chakkar: Fun On The Run
programme.desc: Siblings Manjeet and Parmeet are arrested for attempted rape and murder. To avoid imprisonment, they have no choice but to marry their supposed victims.

programme.title: Dashing CM Bharat
programme.desc: Bharath, an NRI, returns to India and learns about the deteriorating political condition. He then decides to contest elections to transform the system, unaware of what awaits him.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sooraj Dhanrajgir, a playboy, falls in love with Komal, who rejects him because of his vices and gives him time to change. Things go awry when a little boy shows up claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Fight Club: Members Only
programme.desc: Four friends decide to start an underground club that lets youngsters fight against each other for money. However, things take a turn after a man gets killed and they are charged with the crime.

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Kabir sets out to seek revenge against a businessman named Raina for falsely accusing him and getting him arrested by kidnapping his daughter Sonia.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. However, when Raju helps a pregnant woman with a jilted lover, he ends up sabotaging his love life.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: The children of secret-agent parents must save them from danger.

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island Of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

programme.title: The Bellboy
programme.desc: Mute bellboy Stanley works at the luxurious Fontainebleau Hotel in Miami Beach. In spite of being a serviceable and friendly employee, the clumsy Stanley gets successively into trouble with his mistakes.

programme.title: Le Mans
programme.desc: A look at the personal relationships of race car drivers and their families, set against the backdrop of a 2-day race in Le Mans, France.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: A father finds himself unemployed and decides to turn his home into a day care.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Paul Brenner, a CID investigator with the power to arrest any military person -- whatever the rank -- anywhere in the world. He's been called in to investigate the murder of Captain Elisabeth Campbell, the daughter of a famous general. What he discovers beneath the well-ordered surface of military life is a sordid secret that makes murder suspects of some of the Army's finest. Based on Nelson DeMille's novel of the same name.

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island Of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: A father finds himself unemployed and decides to turn his home into a day care.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

programme.title: White Christmas
programme.desc: Irving Berlin's songs and dances are performed by two happy couples who discover that love, romance and a Christmas Eve snowfall make everyone's dreams come true. The beloved title song of this film was introduced in the film HOLIDAY INN.

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island Of Lost Dreams

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Inspired by Cyrano de Bergerac, the comic story of a man with the heart of a great lover, the soul of a poet, and the nose for trouble.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: To rescue his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and battle an old enemy . . . and rediscover the child in himself.

programme.title: Boeing-Boeing

programme.desc: Through three different but interconnected stories, we follow three young characters – a young girl, a lovelorn woman and a widow, mother of eight children - and their painful personal journeys set against the backdrop of the Sri Lankan Civil War.

programme.title: The Startup
programme.desc: A true story of Matteo Achilli, an 18 year-old boy, who designs an innovative job-searching app. Though response is initially lacklustre, he perseveres. Soon enough, his app brings him immense popularity and wealth. But success comes with a hefty price.

programme.title: Gold Runner

programme.title: Burning Birds
programme.desc: After her husband is murdered by a local militia, Kusum has to support her eight children and her mother-in-law. With the breadwinner gone, Kusum has to make extreme choices in the face of her desperation.

programme.desc: A little girl’s game of “police and thief” with her father is interrupted by the outbreak of riots. Through her perspective, we follow her as she escapes from the shophouse unaware of the chaos unfolding around her.

programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: Young Fit… And Almost Good Looking

programme.desc: War Co-Respondent - Aggie O’Shea, a famous war correspondent, arrives at the 4077th and is instantly smitten with B.J. Hunnicut. Aggie is intelligent, warm and vivacious and B.J. soon fears that he is falling in love with her in return and he struggles to remain faithful to Peg. Hawkeye is also attracted to the lovely writer but is clear-headed enough to help his married friend realize that Aggie is merely an infatuation during a desperate and lonely war.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep24
programme.desc: Back Pay - Hawkeye is incensed by the way civilian doctors back in the states are profiting from the war, so he decides to take matters into his own hands and sends the Army a bill for services rendered. This unheard-of demand inevitably brings on an Army investigation. Meanwhile, three Korean Medics arrive at the 4077th and Charles reluctantly agrees to demonstrate some American medical practices for their benefit. During Charles’ rather condescending tutorial, his back goes out. When the medics offer Charles an acupuncture treatment he refuses; then when the pain is unbearable, he changes his mind and gets a pleasant surprise.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep25
programme.desc: April Fools - Colonel Daniel Webster Tucker is an officer with a reputation for discipline and he heads to the 4077th just as a wave of April Fool’s Day pranks start hitting the unit. Col. Potter tries without success to halt the jokes before the arrival of the stodgy Col. Tucker, who is appalled by the unprofessional behavior of the unit and lets them know it. This does not endear him to the capricious M*A*S*H unit, and they bear him a wide berth. When Colonel Tucker has a heart attack at the Officer’s Club, the company rushes to his aid; the joke is on them when the Colonel suddenly revives and says “April Fools!”

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep01
programme.desc: The Best Of Enemies - Hawkeye is on his way to Seoul when he is ambushed by a North Korean soldier and taken prisoner. While Hawkeye gets acquainted with his captor, the members of the 4077th are blissfully unaware of his plight and amuse themselves by holding a bridge tournament. Colonel Potter and Charles Winchester are cool adversaries in the battle for bridge champion of the 4077th. Hawkeye's resolve and wits see him through yet another harrowing war experience.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep177
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: 8 Bit Philosophy: Philosophy And People - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: Halo Ep5
programme.desc: Reckoning - On the run and out of options, Kwan and Soren have a difference of opinion. John makes a horrible discovery.

programme.title: Halo Ep6
programme.desc: Solace - Survivors from battle return to Reach. John confronts Dr. Halsey, and the lies of his past. The new prisoner seems to know John better than he knows himself.

programme.title: Halo Ep7
programme.desc: Inheritance - Kwan’s journey to uncover her family’s “true purpose” takes her deep into the deserts of Madrigal. Soren obsesses over unfinished business.

programme.title: Halo Ep8
programme.desc: Allegiance - John and Makee come to terms with their shared vision. Halsey has one last chance to save her mission, and herself.

programme.title: Bokeh
programme.desc: On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared. Their struggle to survive the mysterious event lead them to reconsider everything.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Fire Station Spirit / Don't Die At Christmas - Rookie EMT Cooper answers a 911 call - a terminally ill, elderly man is in cardiac arrest. Firefighter/Paramedic Keith Bailey responds to a 911 call a few days before Christmas.

programme.title: My Paranormal Nightmare Ep1
programme.desc: Haunted Grounds - In this episode the home is not a haven but a haunted ground when poltergeists take up residence where they don’t belong... and ruthlessly fight against eviction.

programme.desc: 8 Bit Philosophy: Philosophy And People - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: Global Effect
programme.desc: A soldier (Daniel Bernhardt) leads a band of mercenaries to rescue a scientist (Mädchen Amick) and prevent a terrorist (Joel West) from unleashing a devastating virus.

programme.title: Curvature
programme.desc: A scientist must break into a top-secret facility in order to travel back in time and prevent a murder after receiving a mysterious phone call from herself.

programme.title: Fatal Crossing
programme.desc: High flying tech entrepreneur Carson wakes up in a bloody car with no memory of what happened the night before. His world in chaos, things only get worse when he falls for June, who believes Carson killed her boyfriend.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Far North - The warm subtropical top of the North Island is famed for its beauty and history, and nowhere in New Zealand is the coast as vividly linked with the sea than on this peninsula.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S9 Ep3
programme.desc: Greek Island of Andros - Ben Fogle ventures to the lesser-known Greek island of Andros to visit Sandy, founder of a remote animal shelter perched on the slopes of the island's highest peak.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Toilet Roll - Gregg Wallace explores the factory that makes 700,000 toilet rolls a day and Cherry Healey gets the bum deal of following a flush through the sewers.

programme.title: Big Cats S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cats have adapted to the challenges of life in almost every environment on Earth. Watch as an acrobatic margay leaps through the jungle treetops in central America, while a pregnant jaguar waits for turtles to arrive on a remote Pacific beach.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In this first episode, Samira journeys to places rarely seen by western audiences to reveal how the Persian Empire was born, the mysterious writing of its early people and how Iran's powerful kings built a vast empire that became the envy of the ancient world.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Potato Waffles - Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman reveal the production processes behind Birds Eye Waffles. Gregg is at their factory in Lowestoft to follow raw product to packaged good.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Outcasts - As the urban world grows, animals are displaced from land that belonged to them. The stories of these wild outcasts are the most captivating of all.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Joanna visits Iran, exploring the tomb of Cyrus the Great before following the Silk Road through Azerbaijan, Georgia and on to Venice. Then she's off to Haiti and Cuba for some unseen adventures in the Caribbean.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep7
programme.desc: In California, it's a vacation from hell as hundreds of campers flee a rampaging wildfire. A rare tornado crashes through the Czech Republic and its sink or swim for a solo adventurer as he attempts to row the perilous Pacific.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Tasmania - Robson Green begins his round-the-world fishing adventure in Tasmania, where he visits a fishing Shangri-La.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - The Waterhole Ep7
programme.desc: While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Highlands Ep7
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Family Ep1
programme.desc: Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies Ep6
programme.desc: At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space – and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - The Waterhole Ep7
programme.desc: While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Family Ep1

In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Kruger's Pafuri Ep2
programme.desc: In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing – water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. It’s a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Wetlands Ep8
programme.desc: Wild Wild East’s wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blanding’s Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blanding’s can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies Ep6
programme.desc: At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space – and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Crustaceans Ep9
programme.desc: The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon Ep10
programme.desc: In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Rebuilding an Empire Ep2
programme.desc: Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Augrabies Falls Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word “oukurubes” which means “place of thunder” in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Crustaceans Ep9
programme.desc: The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Rebuilding an Empire Ep2
programme.desc: Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Rebuilding an Empire Ep2
programme.desc: Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Augrabies Falls Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word “oukurubes” which means “place of thunder” in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon Ep10
programme.desc: In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Invasion Ep11
programme.desc: Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. It’s turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Seasons Ep12
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year — and four seasons — looks like for the wildest animals of Canada’s East-Coast.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Animals Gone Wild Ep3
programme.desc: As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - The Lower Zambezi Ep4
programme.desc: Food, water and shelter are essential to all life on earth from the smallest of beings to the largest, and along the banks of one of Africa’s greatest rivers, some animals struggle while others thrive. A rhythm drives all animals as they journey in search of what they need to survive, and each must decide where and when to move if they’re to succeed... These are the magical worlds of the Lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.
