programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Rupert And The Invisible Foxes - The Fox Twins trick Raggety into turning them invisible with a magical glowing leaf so they can steal Rupert's picnic. When they're discovered Ping Pong tries to reverse the magic but inadvertently makes herself invisible too. Raggety is the only one who can help them but he's lost his magic leaf. Will Rupert and friends be able to find it before its glow finally vanishes and the Foxes and Ping Pong are forced to stay invisible for ever?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Rupert And The Dew Fairy - Rupert and friends are asleep in a tent in Rupert's garden. Rupert wakes up very early to hear sounds outside. He finds Daisy the Dew Fairy, busy scattering dew in preparation for the arrival of the Dawn Chorus. She is very nervous as it's her first day doing the whole of Nutwood and she hopes to earn her golden wings that morning. But then she realises she has lost her dew bucket. Rupert offers to help her find it. Meanwhile, an early-rising Raggety comes across the strange shiny bucket and can't resist investigating. By the time Rupert and Daisy find him he has emptied all the dew out. Daisy is frantic – if she doesn't get Nutwood ready in time for the Dawn Chorus she will not earn her golden wings. Rupert persuades Raggety to do elf magic to replace the missing dew and the two of them help Daisy make up for lost time, spreading dew throughout the garden. But what is this Dawn Chorus Daisy talks of? They are in for a wonderful musical surprise when their work is complete.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep37
programme.desc: The Monkey That Roared - Something strange is going on in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Every time Raa Raa visits a friend there is a loud roar… and it wasn't him! Who could it be? Raa Raa sets off to find out

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep38
programme.desc: Something New - Raa Raa is looking for something new in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. He is so busy looking, he doesn't spot all the strange new things going on around him

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep89
programme.desc: Slugsy Won'T Slide - Slugsy has put too much slime on his slide and is terrified of sliding off it. Can the other tots help him overcome his fear?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep90
programme.desc: Flowertot Taxi - Stingo is sure he is on to a good thing when he decides to start up a taxi service using… slug power! Slugsy is soon exhausted and unable to keep up with the demand

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Grizzly’S Great Outdoors - A snake bite causes Grizzly Griller to forget all his survival know-how, so it’s down to his greatest fan Dennis to help him re-learn his survival skills so they can all make it safely back to civilization.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Bertie’S Backbone - Dennis and the gang train Bertie in the art of standing up to people so he can rebel against Walter’s bossiness – but they train him too well and he becomes a dangerous rebel without a clue!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep45
programme.desc: White Lion - Secrets unfold when the team uses Haggar’s map to ventur eto a mythical planet

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep19
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter Two - On a quest to find the power gem of fire, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Hawaii. They're confronted with another monstrous guardian inside of a volcano in order to retrieve the gem... but wind up losing the gem to a surfing competition that uses it as part of their surf trophy

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep19
programme.desc: Mall Is Well / Taco Tank - Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall.//Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep8
programme.desc: Tortools - The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Stuck In Skates / Lawn Circles - After ice skating with his pen pal, Archibald can't remove his too-tight skates. Crackridge has crop circles. Could aliens really be responsible?

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets Lost To Shadow - The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do The Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesn’t think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggie’s big moment going.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep33
programme.desc: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish - When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Oh's life in the process

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep41
programme.desc: Why Parrot Can'T Keep A Secret - You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldn't open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lion's mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep42
programme.desc: Why Bushbaby Has Big Eyes - You see there was a time when Bushbaby didn't have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesn't believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you can't see him, he's not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Moving Train Tracks - Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry – the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They can't get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved. With the help of Bumpy and Revs, Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the train tracks were moved by Fairy Coco who was tired to having to do all the work for Queen Sparklewings. If no one came to the picnic at all, there'd be no tidying up to do. Fairy Coco tells the Queen that she's very sorry for causing a mess and the Queen tells her that she's sorry too. She didn't mean to make the Fairies do all the work and miss out on the fun! Later, the picnic takes place and everyone helps clear up afterwards. It's much quicker and much more fun if everyone helps out together! Good job Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The King Of Toyland - Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pat's and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is. Pat-Pat doesn't but following the clue of a cut out crown shape in orange card and using his investigative skills Noddy works out that Cloppycorn is the King of Toyland. He was fed up being bossed around by Hoof and Bling so decided to be king for the day with a little help from Queen Sparklewings. Bling and Hoof are sorry for upsetting Noddy and everyone is friends again in time for the Royal Ball! Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep41
programme.desc: What’S Happened To My Little Tree? - Jess shows us his little tree: a beautiful flowering shrub in full bloom. He tells us that his little tree didn't always look like this...there was a time when the tree's leaves turned yellow! What's happening to my little tree? That's the Big Question! Jess asks Mimi for help, but she's in bed with a bad cold. She's drinking lots of fluids to help make her better. Jess gives his little tree some more water to help make it better but when he goes to check on his tree the next day the leaves have turned brown and crinkly! Baa and Billie come along - Billie is tucked in the brim of Baa's woolly hat, it's too cold for her to come out. Jess wonders if his little tree is cold and needs warming up. So he wraps a potato sack round the little tree. But the next day things are even worse the leaves are falling off.! And it's happening all over Greendale Farm! Jess goes to see Horace who is busy composing a new song. It's all about the Seasons. Jess finally realises that what's happening to his tree is perfe

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep42
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Cool? - It's the day of Mimi's dance in Jess's barn but its too hot to move, let alone dance. Jess wonders how they can all keep cool! That's the BIG QUESTION. Jess asks his friends for ideas. Horace keeps cool by swimming under water, but that's no good for Jess and everyone else who can't swim. The puppies keep cool by panting, but that just makes Jess even hotter and out of breath. And Willow keeps cool by standing very still. That won't work for a dance, they can't all keep still! Mimi comes past holding a little fan which makes a lovely cool breeze. Jess realises that what they need is a giant fan that could make a cool breeze in the barn. He and Mimi make a huge fan which Horace works as part of his one-man band. Everyone has a great time dancing and keeping cool. Jess has answered the Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Rupert And The Apple River - Rupert and friends are going apple picking by the river. It's a hot day, so Ping Pong offers to magic up some fizzy apple drink for them all to drink afterwards. But her spell goes very wrong, sending giant apples rolling down into the river. Just as Rupert is suggesting Ping Pong try again they are all amazed to see Ming float by, surrounded by apply-bubbles. Ping Pong's giant magic apples have turned the river into a fizzy apple juice river, and the bubbles make you float. Soon Rupert and friends are having a great time, sucking in bubbles and floating about. But then Edward notices a problem. The apples are causing a log jam at the bridge and unless they can get them out, the river will flood. How will they get the river back to normal and prevent Nutwood being swept away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Rupert To The Rescue! - Freddy and Freda “borrow” Ping Pong's Magic Book and accidentally say a spell that makes their toy cupboard float off across Nutwood. Rupert takes charge of trying to stop the runaway item of furniture before it does any damage, trying to lasso it. But the Fox Twins meddle again, and Ping Pong gets tangled up in the lasso, ends up floating high in the sky, dangling from the flying cupboard! Things become even more serious when she floats out over the sea and gets stranded on a rock. Rupert has to make the Fox Twins face up to the trouble they've caused, and find a way to undo the magic.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep39
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Book Of Noises - Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep40
programme.desc: Dr Raa Raa - Raa Raa is busy racing round the jungle in his emergency cubbybuggy coming to the rescue for every bump and scrape. But do all his friends really need medical treatment?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King'S Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep91
programme.desc: Fifi'S Happy Day - Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep151
programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep152
programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Blue - It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants for her birthday. While we look for Clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns & take a trip to Joe's Present Store.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Big Face in Space - The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in.

programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.desc: Paddington And The Missing Tickets - Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.desc: Space Alien Adventure! - Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Mega Mud Robot - Gasquatch is back! He’s been saving up his money to buy the ultimate toy, a Mega Mud Robot. But when his coins go missing, it’s up to Blaze to help his mud-loving friend recover them before the toy store closes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Crystal catastrophe / Good Steel bad Steel - Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fundraising Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Elephant Trunk-A-Dunk! - Gil's looking for elephants! He loves them all-African and Asian. He's in for a treat when the Guppies fill the stands for the Trunk-A-Dunk, a basketball game played by pachyderms!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep517
programme.desc: The Blaze Family - Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Fruit Festival - Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Pirate Painter - When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe / Pups Save a Train - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes? // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Cali’s train from a rockslide!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep93
programme.desc: Cold - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are outside in the cold when they spot the Tiddlytubbies who are warm, inside. The Teletubbies put on hats, gloves and scarves to keep warm.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: Plane - Dee encourages a friend to say 'plane' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We explore a flying plane, a landing plane, a fast plane and even meeting a sneezing plane!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep53
programme.desc: Hill Stop - When a Po can't drive his little car over a big hill, the Team downsize the problem.

programme.desc: It's Time to Play Hospitals - When Panda's arm gets a small tear in the park, Gran Gran has a plan to head home and set up a hospital for Panda and JoJo's other toys!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Cosmic Clean Up - When Stan and Violet ask Monty to tidy his room, they suggest he turn it into a game to make it more fun, but Monty begins to question whether it's possible to turn a task like tidying into a game.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Tiny Little Me - When Monty and Jimmy Jones discover that Jeanie is having trouble writing lyrics for her song, they suggest they all spend some time in the backyard looking for inspiration, and imagine what the garden would look like if they were shrunk down to the size of a bee.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep30

programme.desc: Miguel’S Compy Conundrum/Strife In The Fast Lane - After Miguel accidentally causes the ranch to be overrun with compies, he learns that working hard to correct a mistake can sometimes yield a surprising result.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep42
programme.desc: With inflation at 30 year highs and interest rates rising, it's important to keep an eye on your money. From surging energy and food costs to worker and supply chain shortages, Rachel Pupazzoni presents the week in economics.

programme.title: The World Ep230
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Inside Central Station S1 Ep6
programme.desc: A breakdown on the city circle line causes chaos across the Network and Customer Service Assistance Tamale manages the boisterous and intoxicated crowds on the night shift.

programme.title: Ticket To Qatar Ep3
programme.desc: Just days out from the start of the FIFA World Cup in Qatar, Tracey Holmes looks at the stories and people involved in Australia's campaign as the Socceroos prepare to take on reigning World Cup Champions France on Wednesday.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep230
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of the day's top stories and the latest news. Michael Tetlow brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities, suburbs and regional communities.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep39
programme.desc: Fugitive found (again); FTX crypto crash; Murdoch dumps Trump.

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak Ep208
programme.desc: Find out what's going on in the world with a news bulletin designed for children, featuring stories that are relevant and easy to understand.

programme.title: Home And Away S33 Ep202
programme.desc: Nikau gets mixed results with his olive branches. Ari and Mia adopt some hope from John. Can Ziggy and Dean get back on the same page? Tane manages to avoid Felicity... Well almost.

programme.title: Q+A Highlights S15 Ep38
programme.desc: The show that puts you at the centre of the conversation. The highlights of Q+A as host Stan Grant is joined by a panel with diverse opinions to cover the topics that have everyone talking.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep230
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date. Michael Tetlow presents ABC Late News from Perth, bringing you detailed coverage of the day's top stories, trusted analysis and new details on the issues and events that shaped our day.

programme.title: Friday Briefing Ep42
programme.desc: Your one stop shop for a wrap-up of the week in politics with some of the sharpest minds in the parliamentary press gallery. Greg Jennett and the panel discuss the big stories that dominated the national news agenda.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
